author: Stereogum
title: Kim Gordon Scored A Potentially Problematic James Franco Film
text: In a new interview with Clash , Kim Gordon reveals that she recently scored a James Franco film. "I like doing it but it depends on the director and how much freedom you have," she said when asked about film scoring. "I did one on my own recently for a film that I don’t … More »
